wordGroup: water flooding 水驱法，注水法

sentences.en: The heavy rains and flooding killed scores of livestock.
sentences.cn: 大雨和洪水淹死了许多家畜。

sentences.en: In the weeks since flooding began, 16 people have died statewide.
sentences.cn: 洪水暴发几周以来，全州已有16人遇难。

sentences.en: When water levels rise, flooding results.
sentences.cn: 水位上升，就会发生洪水。
